examples.example: 我们要好好锻炼身体，保持健康的状态。

translate.english: We should take good care of exercising and keep a healthy state.

examples.example: 每天坚持锻炼对我们的身体有很大的好处。

translate.english: Keeping exercising every day has great benefits to our bodies.

examples.example: 我们应该珍惜自己的身体，用它去探索和感受美好的世界。

translate.english: We should cherish our own bodies and use them to explore and feel the beautiful world.
